ch.unifr.pai.twice.utils.cursorSimulator.client.utils
Class MouseMovement

java.lang.Object
  ch.unifr.pai.twice.utils.cursorSimulator.client.utils.MouseMovement

public class MouseMovement
extends java.lang.Object

A class defining an atomic mouse movement by the definition of x-coordinate, y-coordinate as well as the duration of the callback. Additionally, a callback can be defined which is fired after the movement has been executed.

Author:
Oliver Schmid
